frame_analysis.summary: From 0.0s to 4.0s, the car is approaching an intersection with a traffic officer standing on the right side of the road. A male on a bicycle, wearing dark clothing, is crossing the road from left to right. A motorcycle is also moving on the left side of the road. From 4.0s to 9.0s, the car makes a left turn at the intersection. A woman in a white coat is walking on the left side of the road, pushing a stroller. A cyclist is also present on the left side of the road. The car continues to turn left and proceeds down the street.
characters: Traffic officer: Standing on the right side of the road, wearing a white hat and a reflective vest.
Cyclist: Male, wearing dark clothing, crossing the road from left to right.
Motorcyclist: Moving on the left side of the road.
Woman: Wearing a white coat, walking on the left side of the road, pushing a stroller.
Cyclist: Present on the left side of the road.
frame_analysis.actions: The vehicle is approaching an intersection and slowing down, likely in response to the presence of a traffic officer and other vehicles at the intersection. The vehicle then makes a left turn at the intersection, navigating around other vehicles and pedestrians. The vehicle is driving slowly to safely navigate the intersection.
